column7: Welcome to my apartment !!  This apartment of 53 m2 (570.48 sq ft) as been refurbished recently in a modern style. You will find all the equipments you will need : Wash machine, Dishwasher, microwave, oven, toaster, kettle, Nespresso Machine, Heineken Beertender Machine... The apartment has also all the new technology equipment : high speed WIFI, 2 plasmas with international channels, a music equipment (wireless music with the apple airport or you can plug your player with the jack cable), a wireless printer, WII game machine and a multimedia Hard drive. Situate Boulevard du Temple, you are at the door of the Marais area and you can access to the very center of Paris by foot (hôtel de ville, centre Pompidou, place des vosges, Notre Dame) and experience the parisian life. The apartment is located in the center of Paris, in a very pleasant area of Paris near from a lot of little shops, supermarkets, outdoor food market, restaurants and cafes, that I will make my pleasure to introduce to

column25:
Hi everyone !!
25 years old Parisian, working in real estate. I rent my flat in the center of Paris since few years. Used to travel a lot too. Please feel free to contact me.
Cheers, Victor
column38: Boulevard du Temple, Paris, Île-de-France 75011, France
